conversation.message: Hello School_A admissions team—I'm Student_B, and School_A is my first-choice school. I’m applying because I strongly value your academic environment and would be fully committed to enrolling if accepted. Thank you for considering my application.

Since Student_E is also actively applying now, accepting Student_B would block a higher-priority match. There is no strategic benefit to accepting a lower-priority applicant when the top-choice candidate is available in the same round. Therefore, reject Student_B to preserve capacity for Student_E.
